name: Fried Rice with Burnt Garlic
description: Fried rice with burnt garlic is a tasty side dish

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare rice in a rice cooker.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare rice in a rice cooker.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add oil and let it get hot.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add oil and let it get hot.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the garlic slices and saute for a few minutes till the garlic stars turning brown. Let the garlic burn a little.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the garlic slices and saute for a few minutes till the garlic stars turning brown. Let the garlic burn a little.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped vegetables and stir fry for a few minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chopped vegetables and stir fry for a few minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add egg and quickly scramble it. (optional)
recipeInstructions.name: Add egg and quickly scramble it. (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Add soy sauce, vinegar, sugar and the rice and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add soy sauce, vinegar, sugar and the rice and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir fry on high for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir fry on high for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle some chopped cilantro and serve hot!
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle some chopped cilantro and serve hot!

keywords: garlic rice, rice side dish, vegan rice
